question: Sasuke Uchiha, In this task, you are given a text and several choices. You need to select the answer that best completes the text. Susan wants to go on a diet because she ___1___ too much lately. She's been eating out at restaurants a lot and has even started skipping meals___2___ she can have more money to spend on dinner. Her clothes are also fitting her tighter than usual, which is another sign that she's gained weight. Susan decides that starting Monday, she will cut out all processed foods and only eat fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins like chicken or fish. She knows it won't be easy, but hopefully by making these changes ___3___ .
answer: Susan wants to go on a diet because she has eaten too much lately. She's been eating out at restaurants a lot and has even started skipping meals so she can have more money to spend on dinner. Her clothes are also fitting her tighter than usual, which is another sign that she's gained weight. Susan decides that starting Monday, she will cut out all processed foods and only eat fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins like chicken or fish. She knows it won't be easy, but hopefully by making these changes, it will be beneficial.
